text: "Si Estuviésemos Juntos" (stylized in upper case; English: "If We Were Together") is a song by Puerto Rican rapper Bad Bunny. The song was released through Rimas Entertainment on December 15, 2018. The nostalgic Spanish-trap song reminisces about a former lover. ==Composition== The song "Si Estuviésemos Juntos" is a Latin trap song and it has a tempo of 86 BPM. ==Music video== The video was released on February 14, 2019 and it currently has more than 45 million views. The nostalgic Spanish-trap song tells the story of the Puerto Rican reggaeton singer reminiscing about a former lover, with the video. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" ! scope="col"| Chart (2018–19) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Spain (PROMUSICAE) | 100 |- |} ==References== Category:2018 singles Category:2018 songs Category:Bad Bunny songs Category:Spanish-language songs Category:Songs written by Bad Bunny Category:Songs written by Camilo Echeverry
title: Si Estuviésemos Juntos
